self_predictions.prediction_summary: David believes he is much stronger and more technical now compared to when he last faced Petro Marharint five years ago. He has analyzed Petro's style and has a plan for the match.
self_predictions.style_conflict: David plans to counter Petro's strong wrist and pronation with his explosive start and improved technique.

Petro Marharint.strength: Very strong, genetically gifted with a wide and thick hand.
Petro Marharint.previous_match_summary: Petro has beaten many top athletes including John Brzenk, Sandris, and others. David lost to him twice in the past when he was younger and less experienced.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: David believes Morozov is at a different level and will dominate the match due to his strength and endurance.

Vitalii Laletin.strength: Very strong with long arms, hard to hook or top roll.
Vitalii Laletin.previous_match_summary: David recalls training with Laletin and notes his difficulty in countering Laletin's style.

Artyom Morozov.strength: Extremely strong and versatile, can adapt to different styles.
Artyom Morozov.previous_match_summary: Morozov has shown consistent performance in long matches.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: David thinks Hutchings will win if he drops to 95kg, as he will have a significant advantage.

Todd Hutchings.strength: Strong and experienced, can cut weight effectively.
Todd Hutchings.previous_match_summary: David has trained with Hutchings and respects his ability to perform under pressure.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Paolo slightly favors David due to his current form and preparation, but acknowledges Petro's genetic gifts and strength.

Petro Marharint.strength: Genetically super gifted, strong and dangerous.
Petro Marharint.previous_match_summary: Petro has beaten many top athletes but has inconsistent training.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Engin notes that Morozov is versatile and can adapt to different styles, making him a favorite.

Artyom Morozov.previous_match_summary: Morozov has shown consistent performance in long matches.
